DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety , efficacy , pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics study drug dulaglutide compare placebo pediatric participant type 2 diabetes . The study duration approximately 60 week .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Dulaglutide ( LY2189265 ) Children Adolescents With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Have type 2 diabetes , treat diet exercise , without metformin and/or basal insulin . Metformin and/or basal insulin dose must stable least 8 week prior study screen . Have HbA1c > 6.5 % ≤11 % screen visit . If newly diagnose medicine diabetes , HbA1c must > 6.5 % ≤9 % . Have BMI ( body mass index ) > 85 percentile age , gender body weight ≥50 kilogram ( 110 pound ) . Known type 1 diabetes , positive GAD65 IA2 antibody , history diabetic ketoacidosis take diabetes medication . A history , risk pancreatitis . Self family history Multiple Endocrine Neoplasia ( MEN ) type 2A B , thyroid Ccell hyperplasia medullary thyroid cancer , blood calcitonin result ≥20 picograms per milliliter ( pg/ml ) screening . A systolic blood pressure ≥160 millimeter mercury ( mmHg ) diastolic ≥100mmHg . Active treat cancer . A blood disorder accurate HbA1c may obtainable . A female childbearing age , sexually active birth control . Pregnant plan pregnant study , breastfeed . Taking diabetic medication metformin basal insulin stop 3 month prior screen visit . Have take oral steroid within last 60 day 20 day use within past year 1000 microgram fluticasone propionate per day . Using prescription weight loss medication last 30 day , plan use . Taking psychiatric medication depression illness attention deficit hyperactivity disorder ( ADHD ) , dose change within last 3 month .
